data.route_analysis: Accessible through major airports, local transportation options include buses and shuttles.
data.pricing_trends: Prices for accommodation and activities can increase during peak tourist season but vary widely based on location and availability.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best time from November to April; ideal for mild temperatures and festivals.
data.booking_windows: Optimal to book 3-6 months in advance for better rates and availability.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Accessible through major airports, local transportation options include buses and shuttles.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Best time from November to April; ideal for mild temperatures and festivals.
destination_insights.climate: Tropical climate with rainy season from May to October. Comfortably cool evenings during fall.
destination_insights.culture: Rich Mayan heritage with vibrant festivals, handicrafts, and traditions.
destination_insights.attractions: Mayan ruins of Tikal, Lake Atitl√°n, Chichicastenango market, and lush rainforests.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Prices for accommodation and activities can increase during peak tourist season but vary widely based on location and availability.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal to book 3-6 months in advance for better rates and availability.
market_insights.demand: Growing interest in cultural and ecotourism driven by travelers seeking unique experiences.
market_insights.competition: Popular alternatives are Costa Rica and Mexico, but Guatemala offers more authentic cultural experiences.

trend_insights.market_trends: Increasing demand for sustainable and cultural travel post-pandemic.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are prioritizing destinations that offer both adventure and cultural heritage.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Guatemala is competing with Caribbean destinations and other Central American countries for eco-conscious travelers.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Peak season coincides with the dry season, influencing travel patterns significantly.
